amendment.description: To set aside Other Procurement, Army funds for the procurement of TSC-750 computer systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1236 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1236 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S9366; text: CR S9366) To set aside Other Procurement, Army funds for the procurement of TSC-750 computer systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1236 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1236 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott.
